name: The Arcade V:1.0
description:
The Arcade V:1.0

7 games to play from including:

- Pacman (Credit to Namco)

- Doodle Jump (Credit to Lima Sky)

- Snake (Credit to Taneli Armanto)

- Flappy Bird (Credit to Dong Nguyen)

- Donkey Kong (Credit to Nintendo)

- Tetris (Credit to Alexey Pajitnov)

- Space Invaders (Credit to Taito)

Controls are found in game!

More updates soon.
